Äntligen har jag fått det att funka!!!!

Följ denna infon och jag lovar att det funkar....

heres the steps get blindwrite version 4.5.7

then install the pcouffin.sys way.

run the program select HD to CD the option on the right.

then click config option. the last option.

then next.

UNCHECK autoplay and enchance weak signals.

then click next

now select the top option to burn to cd.

click next find the bwt file

click next and click start to verification of the image. it should be ok.

click next and select DOA+pw and select 8 speed.

it will ask yoy if u want to burn  BWA Physical Information CLICK YES.

after 4 coasters this procedure just worked.

let me know how u get on, it has to work.

dont need a cracl. i found out why it was not working. theres a file
missing from the torrent i downloaded. if its the same thing asking
for an original cd, then download emule, and seach for a file called
CM5.BWA, Once you have that, put it in the same dir as the image,
ready for burning with blindwrite. then follow the instructions on the
nfo file that came with the torrent. it was ask about physical data,
click yes to it and it burns it without the copy protection. try that.
it worked for me. also a friend told me that if you hold down the
shift key when you put the cd in, and load the game up trhough the
start->programfiles->champmanager icon that way, it will also work.
try and get back to me hydrasoul@gmail.com.
